verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יֵה֣וּא <S%H3058><s%> came to Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲנָ֔נִי <S%H2607><s%> of Hanani עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בַּעְשָׁ֖א <S%H1201><s%> against Baasha לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> as אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> I הֲרִימֹתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7311><s%> Forasmuch as I exalted מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הֶ֣עָפָ֔ר <S%H6083><s%> thee out of the dust וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> and made נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> thee prince עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> have walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way יָרָבְעָ֗ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam וַֽתַּחֲטִא֙ <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> and hast made my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לְהַכְעִיסֵ֖נִי <S%H3707><s%> to provoke me to anger בְּחַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> with their sins

הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold מַבְעִ֛יר <S%H1197><s%> Behold I will take away אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> the posterity בַעְשָׁ֖א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> and the posterity בֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> and will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣יתְךָ֔ <S%H1004><s%> thy house כְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> like the house יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָֽט׃ <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat

הַמֵּ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> Him that dieth לְבַעְשָׁא֙ <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city יֹֽאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> eat הַכְּלָבִ֑ים <S%H3611><s%> shall the dogs וְהַמֵּ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> and him that dieth לוֹ֙ בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of his in the fields יֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> eat ע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> shall the fowls הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of the air

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts בַעְשָׁ֛א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and what עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and what he did וּגְבֽוּרָת֑וֹ <S%H1369><s%> and his might הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept בַּעְשָׁא֙ <S%H1201><s%> So Baasha עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּתִרְצָ֑ה <S%H8656><s%> in Tirzah וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אֵלָ֥ה <S%H425><s%> and Elah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וְגַ֡ם <S%H1571><s%> Moreover בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> And also by the hand יֵה֨וּא <S%H3058><s%> Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲנָ֜נִי <S%H2607><s%> of Hanani הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> of the prophet דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> came the word יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בַּעְשָׁ֨א <S%H1201><s%> against Baasha וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בֵּית֜וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and against his house וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָרָעָ֣ה ׀ <S%H7451><s%> even for all the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֣ה ׀ <S%H6213><s%> that he did בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסוֹ֙ <S%H3707><s%> in provoking him to anger בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> with the work יָדָ֔יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> being כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in being like the house יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> because אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> and because he killed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> פ

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <S%H8337><s%> and sixth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> two years לְאָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> to reign אֵלָ֨ה <S%H425><s%> began Elah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּעְשָׁ֧א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel בְּתִרְצָ֖ה <S%H8656><s%> in Tirzah שְׁנָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H8141><s%> year

וַיִּקְשֹׁ֤ר <S%H7194><s%> conspired עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> against עַבְדּ֣וֹ <S%H5650><s%> And his servant זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> Zimri שַׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> captain מַחֲצִ֣ית <S%H4276><s%> of half הָרָ֑כֶב <S%H7393><s%> [his] chariots וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> now he בְתִרְצָה֙ <S%H8656><s%> against him as he was in Tirzah שֹׁתֶ֣ה <S%H8354><s%> drinking שִׁכּ֔וֹר <S%H7910><s%> himself drunk בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אַרְצָ֔א <S%H777><s%> of Arza אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> steward of [his] house בְּתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> in Tirzah

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> went in זִמְרִי֙ <S%H2174><s%> And Zimri וַיַּכֵּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and smote וַיְמִיתֵ֔הוּ <S%H4191><s%> him and killed בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> him in the twenty וָשֶׁ֔בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seventh לְאָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came בְמָלְכ֜וֹ <S%H4427><s%> And it came to pass when he began to reign כְּשִׁבְתּ֣וֹ <S%H3427><s%> as soon as he sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> on his throne הִכָּה֙ <S%H5221><s%> [that] he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> all the house בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִשְׁאִ֥יר <S%H7604><s%> he left ל֖וֹ מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <S%H8366><s%> him not one that pisseth בְּקִ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> against a wall וְגֹאֲלָ֖יו <S%H1350><s%> neither of his kinsfolks וְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> nor of his friends

וַיַּשְׁמֵ֣ד <S%H8045><s%> destroy זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> Thus did Zimri אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> all the house בַּעְשָׁ֑א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha כִּדְבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> against Baasha בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by יֵה֥וּא <S%H3058><s%> Jehu הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet

אֶ֚ל <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּ֣אות <S%H2403><s%> For all the sins בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha וְחַטֹּ֖אות <S%H2403><s%> and the sins אֵלָ֣ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah בְנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטְא֗וּ <S%H2398><s%> by which they sinned וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and which הֶחֱטִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and by which they made Israel לְהַכְעִ֗יס <S%H3707><s%> to anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> in provoking the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּהַבְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1892><s%> with their vanities

וְיֶ֛תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel פ

בִּשְׁנַת֩ <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וָשֶׁ֜בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seventh שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְאָסָא֙ <S%H609><s%> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reign זִמְרִ֛י <S%H2174><s%> did Zimri שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days בְּתִרְצָ֑ה <S%H8656><s%> in Tirzah וְהָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people חֹנִ֔ים <S%H2583><s%> [were] encamped עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against גִּבְּת֖וֹן <S%H1405><s%> against Gibbethon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> which [belonged] to the Philistines

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people הַחֹנִ֣ים <S%H2583><s%> [that were] encamped לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> say קָשַׁ֣ר <S%H7194><s%> hath conspired זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> Zimri וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> and hath also slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיַּמְלִ֣כוּ <S%H4427><s%> king כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> wherefore all Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָמְרִ֨י <S%H6018><s%> made Omri שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צָבָ֧א <S%H6635><s%> of the host עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> in the camp

וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> went up עָמְרִ֛י <S%H6018><s%> And Omri וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> from מִֽגִּבְּת֑וֹן <S%H1405><s%> from Gibbethon וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <S%H6696><s%> with him and they besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and תִּרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> Tirzah

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְא֤וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw זִמְרִי֙ <S%H2174><s%> And it came to pass when Zimri כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִלְכְּדָ֣ה <S%H3920><s%> was taken הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> that the city וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> that he went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַרְמ֣וֹן <S%H759><s%> into the palace בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וַיִּשְׂרֹ֨ף <S%H8313><s%> and burnt עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> house מֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> over him with fire וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and died

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <S%H2403><s%> of his sins ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> which he sinned לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> in doing הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> walking בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way יָרָבְעָ֔ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam וּבְחַטָּאתוֹ֙ <S%H2403><s%> For his sins אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> which he did לְהַחֲטִ֖יא <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> to make Israel

וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> of Zimri וְקִשְׁר֖וֹ <S%H7195><s%> and his treason אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which קָשָׁ֑ר <S%H7194><s%> that he wrought הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel פ
